coreAttributes.name: v-string panties
coreAttributes.description: A pair of feminine, v-string panties, made from soft cotton.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the v-string panties, before pulling them up to cover [npc.her] private parts.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the v-string panties up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the v-string panties up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] v-string panties down and [npc.verb(kick)] them off [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] down [npc2.namePos] v-string panties and [npc.verb(pull)] them off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] v-string panties and [npc.verb(yank)] them off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
